DESCRIPTION: You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn. NL At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.
Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies. Has no #yEvoke effect if its passive has not been triggered yet.
Stance: If you have less than #b6 Plated Armor at the start of your turn, gain #b2 Plated Armor. NL When you leave this Stance, gain #b1 Artifact.
